title: Gokujou Danshi to Kurashitemasu.
original_name: 極上男子と暮らしてます。
sinopse:
Ruki is an otaku and is in love with a character of manga called Shun-sama! Suddenly she meet a guy that will live in her house due to her mother sudden travelling and that looks exactly the same of Shun-sama! But does this guy is really a prince-like such as Ruki expect?

(Source: MU)
